title: Giving the Freedom Caucus Its Due
description:
Are conservatives making a horrible mistake … in branding? On The Gist, Slate’s Reihan Salam shares his ideas for how the Republican Party could change the conversation to better match its supporters’ priorities. For the Spiel, nurture your pet cause on Adoption Day.
